name: Orion's Belt (itch)
description:
This is a clone of a retro classic called Asteroids.  This game was made as part of a group assignment using the Unity Engine.

Team:

William Carattini

Ashley Prieto

Matthew Wisner

Controls:

WASD or Up, Down, Left, Right keys to move

Left mouse button to fire

Game Modes:

Normal - gain a life every 2k points; 10k = win

Survival - no lives gained; 10k = win.
